lead_paragraph: The decision was intended in part to mitigate government spending cuts expected after the Conservative Party’s election victory.

headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Bank of England Keeps Interest Rate Steady at 0.5%
headline.main: Bank of England Holds Rates Steady

snippet: The decision was intended in part to mitigate government spending cuts expected after the Conservative Party’s election victory.
abstract: Bank of England announces it will keep benchmark interest rate at 0.5 percent to allow markets time to react to election victory of Prime Min David Cameron's Conservative Party, which campaigned on fiscal tightening.
